name: BirdKill
description:
Hy, this is my very first game that I've started developing as a University project years ago. It is not a full game, it is very limited and it has some bugs, that you will find out. Please take a moment and appreciate my work, by donating. Right now I am a game developer and I want to start a one person indie game studio. I am working in unity right now so you can expect new, bug-free (hopefully) games in the near future. Please Like, Share and if you have the possibility Donate to sustain my work. 

Hope you have a great time, stay safe.
